text:
Set in the 1990s, Captain Marvel follows Danvers, an Air Force officer, as she becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes after earth gets involved in a galactic war between alien. The film is directed by Anna Boden and Ryan Fleck.
Brie Larson has already had her first solo outing as Carol Danvers in "Captain Marvel" and it was confirmed earlier this month that the film's success would pave way for a sequel. According to The Hollywood Reporter, Marvel Studios have started working on the script and the plan to begin production next year.
Meanwhile, Samuel L Jackson who reprised his role as Nick Fury in Captain Marvel revealed he believes there are plans to connect the character more directly to her MCU origin story going forward. During an interview with MTV News, Jackson teased: "(Captain Marvel) just opened up all these different possibilities because the (skrulls') whole thing, they have a totally different purpose (than what we thought).
"Their ability to go elsewhere, to change their appearance... I think there are still some Skrulls out there that you don't know are Skrulls, even within our group."
Jackson said he hopes audiences will see more about the character Captain Marvel, including more backstory, adding, "I'd love to explore, from here on out, that aspect of Captian Marvel... that aspect of the Skrulls".
